title: Warden Nautilus
body:
Does anybody know how much this skin is going to cost? 1350 or 975.
Is there a way to know ahead of time, or you just have to wait for it to release?

replies.body: 750 Rp, as this skin does not have any new animation.
I believe it was mentioned by a red somewhere that he will actually cost 725 RP. Pretty sweet deal huh? I plan on picking him up as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Overrkill,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wUZQ214h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-12T13:47:41.339+0000)
>
> I believe it was mentioned by a red somewhere that he will actually cost 725 RP. Pretty sweet deal huh? I plan on picking him up as well.

750*
YAY! I only have 2138 Riot points. So if only 750, I'll be able to get that and Lunar Diana!!!!
